about_the_game:
YWDHT is a turn-based survival horror roleplaying game inspired by Resident Evil.

Choose… from the six member team of Alpha Unit, each with unique skills and motivations.

Explore… a mysterious estate where nothing is what it seems.

Survive… against horrifying creatures and manufactured nightmares.

Die… but know that your actions and progress carry forward in an evolving story.

This is a game for those who enjoy dangerous, unpredictable situations.
It is also a love letter to the era of horror entertainment that inspired it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Take control of an elite police unit trapped in a mansion, unravel the mystery of their captivity, and battle horrifying creatures in a Survival Horror RPG where death is just the beginning. You will die here tonight, but anything you find might help the others escape...
